i.name: Rising Spell Force
i.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

q.name: Mystic Shot
q.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.

w.name: Essence Flux
w.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.

e.name: Arcane Shift
e.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.

r.name: Trueshot Barrage
r.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).

riot.name: Rising Spell Force
riot.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

i1.name: Rising Spell Force
i1.blurb: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.
i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Every time '''Ezreal''' hits a unit with one of his [[Champion ability|abilities]], he gains {{sti|as|{{as|10% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times for a maximum of {{as|50%|attack speed}}.

riot.name: Mystic Shot
riot.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns slightly if it strikes an enemy unit.
riot.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ cdrefund }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

q1.name: Mystic Shot
q1.blurb: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' fires a bolt of energy in a line, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy hit, and applying [[on-hit effect]]s.
q1.description2: If ''Mystic Shot'' successfully hits an enemy, all of '''Ezreal's''' ability {{sti|cooldown|cooldowns}} are reduced by {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
notes: * ''Mystic Shot's'' built-in cooldown reduction will also apply to itself.
** With 45% cooldown reduction, it will be {{fd|2.475}} seconds ({{fd|0.975}} if it hits a target).

riot.name: Essence Flux
riot.description: Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit. If Ezreal hits an enemy with the orb, it detonates and deals damage.
riot.tooltip:
Ezreal fires an orb that sticks to the first champion or objective hit for {{ detonationtimeout }} seconds.

Hitting the orb with an ability or attack detonates it dealing {{ damage }} magic damage. Detonating with an ability refunds the cost of that ability +{{ manareturn }} mana.

w1.name: Essence Flux
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' fires an orb that sticks to first champion, epic monster, or structure hit for 4 seconds.
w1.description2: Hitting the target with an ability or basic attack detonates the orb, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}}.
w1.description3: Detonating with an ability refunds the cost of that ability plus {{sti|mana|{{as|60 mana}}}}.

riot.name: Arcane Shift
riot.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit. Prioritizes enemies stuck with Essence Flux.
riot.tooltip:
Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage.

Arcane Shift will prioritize targets stuck with Essence Flux.

e1.name: Arcane Shift
e1.blurb: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' {{tip|blinks}} to the target location, firing a homing bolt that deals {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemy.
e1.description2: ''Arcane Shift '' prioritizes target hit by {{ai|Essence Flux|Ezreal}}.
notes: * ''Arcane Shift's'' cast time cannot be interrupted by anything other than ''Ezreal's'' own death. He will still suffer any [[crowd control]] effects, duration permitting, after it ends.
* ''Arcane Shift's'' homing projectile can target and hit [[stealth]]ed units and units hidden in fog of war.
** It will also grant {{tip|sight|vision}} of the targeted unit hidden in the fog of war for a brief duration.
* ''Arcane Shift's'' homing projectile does not prioritize champions.

riot.name: Trueshot Barrage
riot.description: Ezreal winds up before firing a powerful barrage of energy that deals massive damage to each unit it passes through (damage is reduced for minions and non-epic monsters).
riot.tooltip:
Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals {{ damage }} magic damage to each enemy it passes through.

Deals {{ damagereductionwaveclear.0*100 }}% damage to minions and non-epic monsters.

r1.name: Trueshot Barrage
r1.blurb: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Ezreal''' winds up for 1 second to fire an [[File:Trueshot Barrage Minimap.png|20px|link=]] energy projectile in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies it passes through.
r1.description2: Minions and non-epic monsters take 50% reduced damage.
notes: * If '''Ezreal''' {{si|flash|flashes}} or is {{tip|airborne|displaced}} mid-cast (i.e {{ai|Rocket Grab|Blitzcrank}}), the projectile will still fire from his position at the time of casting.
* ''Trueshot Barrage's'' projectile grants {{tip|sight}} in a small radius around its current location.
